title: Management Trainee Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation (Hyderābād)
Interview Descriptions: Submitted the resume and cover letter as per the format Made a video on why I am suitable for the role as per the requirement. A topic was given to give my opinion on it Personal interview

title: Corporate Trainer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation (Hyderābād) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: The whole process was amazing. Excellence at its best! Professionalism! They sent me a zoom link on my mail and asked me to connect at 9:30 am sharp. I prepared a presentation for the interview, then I was appreciated for my presentation skills and I was asked questions about the organization to test my knowledge, then there were few questions about the subject and adult learning styles.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your self,  Subject related questions and interpersonal skills testing.

title: Community Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation (Patna, Bihar) in Jun 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview consisted of basic questions about your personality. Overall it is just a simple one to one conversation. They would ask about your interests and dislikes. The interviewer was polite.
Interview Questions:
1. About Personality
2. About interest in agriculture
3. About stay

title: Management Trainee Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation
Interview Descriptions: It was a well thought out interview. It was a two stage process with a great panel and some interesting questions. I wish it had been better timed and managed, though.

title: HR Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation (Hyderābād) in Jan 2020
Interview Descriptions: Quite a lengthy process and covered 5-6 rounds With unnecessary questions. Also, they don't pay for new joined travel and accommodation. Lot of documentation required from.previous jobs. Overall my experience was not good and unsatiafied
Interview Questions: Behavioural questions, past experiences, hypothetical questions

title: Assistant Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation (Hyderābād) in Aug 2018
Interview Descriptions:
The interview was a five-stage process. There was a set list of questions, which would be asked by five different people at different times, and answers would then be tallied.

This was time-consuming and exhausting at times, since I was working elsewhere and had to repeatedly apply for leaves to be able to attend interviews. The interviews also felt stilted and inorganic after the first couple of times, since I already knew the questions that were going to be asked, and I felt I was repeating myself.
Interview Questions: Describe a situation where you felt you went over and above your job role.

title: Learning and Development Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation (Hyderābād) in Feb 2018
Interview Descriptions: Three rounds of interviews. Same questions are asked again and again. It is a bit tedious and cumbersome. You have to get used to repeating yourself. Questions are not always job-related, they may be general also.
Interview Questions: Describe a challenge you faced and how you handled it.

title: Strategy Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions:
Preliminary screening happened over a phone call - approx 1 hour - by HR

2 rounds of Technical Skills and Competencies evaluation by 2 different interviewers - 30 mins to 45 mins per interview - Vertical Heads / Department Heads

1 interview with the CEO - 90 minutes
Interview Questions:
How will you adapt to this sector? 

What will you do in your role?

title: Deputy Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation (Hyderābād) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: 1) First round was with consultant. 2) Second round was Telephonic with reporting manager 2) Third round was Face-to face interview with RM 3) FOurth round was a presentation Assignment 4) Two rounds with cross functional team 5) Personality tests
Interview Questions: Questions on previous work experience, personality, situation based questions

title: Trainer Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation (Pune) in Aug 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was at job fair arranged by one college an job portal in campus and Interview was conducted by Company manager at one job fair, candidates were called up one by one after submitting their resume
Interview Questions: What do you know about Corporate Social  Responsibility (CSR)?

title: Packaging Development Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation (Mumbai) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions: HR round Followed by Interview By the Director of the Department, was a technical interview.Lastly interviewed and selected by the Senior Director. It was a very difficult interview as i did not belong from the Pharma Industry.

title: Facilitator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Dr. Reddy's Foundation (Calcutta) in Nov 2012
Interview Descriptions: First round was telephonic interview. Second round was aptitude tests. There were 2 HR rounds- Zonal HR and Head Office HR. Last round was interview by Program Manager. People were friendly, supportive yet professional.
